￼Return of Sensitive Eddie Welcome back from the health farm, Eddie you\u2019re looking well, are you sick? after all that fresh air & herb tea lay off the auld Clandew, Eddie lay off the auld Scotsmac or next month you\u2019ll just be back propping up the wine bar alter a'1 rambling & gambling & shambling, Eddie your crooked wee eyes cocked at any tight skirt in sight Was not meditation blissful, Eddie? was not brow n rice beneficial? so don\u2019t end up back in bedlam, Ed up to your oxters in shite no more wacky backy, stay steady, Eddie keep your zipper in its clipper no more pervy polaroids either or horsing back the jungle juice that sends you, Ed, all of a dither SOBER SOBRIETY there, I\u2019ve said it, Eddie now that was fairly painless Not a bit of wonder, Eddie as in the good old fruity days your covering your ears with your paws & sprawling about on the stormy sea of your bed-settee-put-me-up like Caligula on a bad day, Eddie I hate to see you suffer like this, Ed, here, have a blast of this... \n￼Cleary 9-22 13/7/93 6:46 pm Page 21 Pooh-pooh Sure we should have known you\u2019d be out of your dome on solvents, Eddie, glue is there no noble causes left to catch a feeble grip of? lighter fuel won\u2019t make you cool if you ignite its gentle barbarism will trail you offstage early blithering & babbling & Evostik just drives you screwy, Ed fierce stuff altogether the auld glue you\u2019ll wander through this riot footage, Eddie like a headless horse in a cartoon like the legendary Mr Magoo you\u2019ll glide blithely through the m urders through the gutted polling booths & when it all goes dangerously askew amid the sizzling barricades in the heavy truncheon charge there will only be hypermarkets, Eddie belonging to zipperheads & sharks & you\u2019ll end up hyperventilating living in the doorway of Marks & Sparks & your face will stick to lamp-posts, Eddie it\u2019s sticky gunge of tears come out of this lustre let me soothe your crazy fears JUST SAY NO & crawl back to bed why not wait for the state, Eddie to kill you off instead... 21 ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 09:47:11.163"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01
